name: Bhavesh Resham Zode

projects.name: Restaurant Table Reservation Portal
projects.description: Developed an online portal for table reservation at restaurants using Python, JavaScript, HTML, and CSS. Integrated functionalities for handling reservations, accounts, and email notifications to enhance user engagement.

projects.name: Learning Companion
projects.description: Created a Discord-like application using Python and JavaScript with sqlite3 for efficient data storage. Fostered community engagement by creating and managing various discussion channels.

projects.name: Movie Recommendation System
projects.description: Designed an ML model for movie recommendations using content-based and collaborative filtering using Python. Used TF-IDF vectorizer and cosine similarity to provide personalized movie suggestions to users.

details: Orchestrated Bizthon and Google Startup Weekend Varanasi, involving 40+ startups and attracting 250+ attendees.
Spearheaded 13+ E-Summit'24 gatherings, with participation from over 6500 individuals.
Led planning and execution of Xpanse, a B-Plan Competition, achieving 500+ participants.
Organized and executed Bid Bonanza, with innovative bidding for startups, drawing 1200+ attendees.

positions_of_responsibility.role: Maintenance Secretary, Hostel Committee IIT BHU
details: Elected with 200+ votes; managed and improved hostel facilities, addressing concerns of 1200+ students.
Successfully developed and executed a proper parking system.

honours_and_achievements: Regularly engaged in coding challenges on Codeforces and LeetCode with a strong rating.
Founder, GuideUp: Established a startup providing mentorship to JEE and NEET aspirants, connecting them with top students from IITs and AIIMS.
Ranked in the top 10% in the National Standard Examination in Physics (NSEP) 2018-19.
extra_curricular_activities: Member, Football Club: Led team to win the Intra-Freshers Tournament.
Secured 2nd position in Group Dance at Aagman'22 IIT BHU.
